title: HR Management Practical Skills Enhancement: Multi-CORE Semantic-Based Second Language Collocation Knowledge Education Course

context.prior_knowledge: Basic English Grammar and Vocabulary Knowledge, Experience with Collocation Use Dependent on L1 Translation
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can identify multiple CORE meanings of six core verbs and classify typical noun collocates according to each meaning with 80% accuracy
Learners can generate context-appropriate verb-noun collocation combinations with 90% accuracy (productive recall)
Learners can identify and correct non-native-like collocation errors with 75% accuracy
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
